p: Currently, several amplification protocols are available on the market and validated for in vitro diagnostic use (CE marked): GeneFinder TM COVID-19 Plus Real Amp Kit (OSANG Healthcare Co., Ltd, South Korea); genesigÂ® Real-Time PCR Coronavirus (COVID-19) (genesig, UK); Allplex TM 2019-nCoV Assay (Seegene, South Korea), etc. Highly sensitive and specific diagnostic assays are key to the identification of cases, contact tracing, identification of the animal source, and implementation of control measures [ 26, 27, 28].
